title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: The issue involves the maximized state of the CVS repository view being lost when switching perspectives.
OB: Upon switching perspectives, the CVS repository view, previously maximized, is no longer in the maximized state. The view returns to its default size.
EB: When switching perspectives, the CVS repository view should remain maximized if it was in that state before the perspective switch. The maximized state should persist across perspective changes.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the CVS repository view.
2. Maximize the view.
3. Switch to a different perspective.
4. Observe that the CVS repository view is no longer maximized, contrary to the expected behavior.
